channel.title: A Simple Webclient Html And Tutorial For Eclipse 639
channel.description:
Its simple but it works :)
Open new notepad file . Copy code below. Save as a .html make sure your encoding is on unicode. Upload to your webhost along with your jarred and signed webclient. [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G2qSQDEzsmY"]Link on how to jar and sign a webclient.[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.softpedia.com/get/Programming/Other-Programming-Files/JAR-Maker.shtml"]Link to JarMaker.[/URL]
[CODE]<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN"> <html> <head> <title>Yourname Webclient</title> <body bgcolor="#00000"> </head> <body> <center> <div id="gameframe"><applet name="Yourname Webclient" archive="client.jar" code="RunClient.class" width="100%" height="100%"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m" /></applet> </body> </center>
<script type="text/javascript"> function leavepage() { return 'Please make sure you have logged out of the game before navigating away.'; } window.onbeforeunload = leavepage; </script> </html>[/CODE]

item.title: A Simple Webclient Html And Tutorial For Eclipse 639
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

[quote=“Silentmic2, post:4, topic:430630”]Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class
load: class RunClient.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class

when i run the html site…[/quote]

note that this is for Eclipse 639 client and you have to change the RunClient to client for 317 and something else for 614 clients keep that in mind

Read full topic
